name: In The Clouds (Ethan Kessler)
description:
CURRENTLY IN DEVELOPMENT

A fast-paced first person shooter. Battle through the floating islands setting the fastest time you can.

Join the Discord

The game is still in active development, at the moment a skeleton game is available for you to bounce around in and set times. Please do upload any bugs, suggestions or pretty screenshots to the discord server. Cheers, Ethan.

By Ethan Kessler, Grey and AMG.
